Corporate team building is basically adult daycare disguised as “company culture.” HR calls it fun, but we all know it’s forced fun. From spaghetti and marshmallow towers to tic-tac-toe on the office floor, companies keep inventing new ways to waste time and call it “synergy.”

In this video, I roast the most ridiculous corporate team-building events and show why these cringey activities don’t bring teams together — they just waste weekends and company money. Forget “teamwork makes the dream work.” The real dream is a day off, better pay, or just not being treated like children at work.

title: CORPORATE CLOWNS - FORCED FUN IS NOT "TEAM BUILDING"
